aboutText1: HillZone Lounge&Rooms entertainment venue welcomes everyone who wants to enjoy delicious food, have a super full and unforgettable entertainment. We guarantee a positive environment.
homeText1: Visit HillZone and make your day unforgettable by spending a pleasant time in our unique lounges, each of which has its own unique style and will satisfy even the most demanding customers. We are waiting for you to enjoy not only our delicious food and various drinks, but also a unique hookah prepared by a professional.
footerText1: HillZone - a place where quality, high-quality service and a warm atmosphere are combined. This is our business card.
footerText3: Delicious dishes, wonderful environment, high-quality service. here is our business card...
aboutText2: HillZone Lounge&Rooms offers a wide variety of the best European dishes, drinks, hookahs. Here you can also play table and other games.
aboutText3: All of our halls are equipped with Play Station 5, with which you can play the most famous and popular games, smart TVs, through which you can watch various movies or watch the most interesting football matches.
aboutCheck1: VIP Room for 10-12 people. Cost: 1 hour: 5000 AMD.
aboutCheck2: Standard Poker Room for 8-10 people. Cost: 1 hour: 5000 AMD.
aboutCheck3: Green Room for 7-8 people. Cost: 1 hour: 4000 AMD.
aboutCheck4: Dali's Room for 5-6 people. Cost: 1 hour: 2500 AMD.
aboutCheck5: Dark Room for 4-5 people. Cost: 1 hour: 2500 AMD.
deliverText1: You can also order your favorite dish from HillZone.
deliverText2: Contact us and we will deliver.
